nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Studying in a different country is a new experience, but there are also some challenges.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_1
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: The first stage of culture-shock adjustment is "the honeymoon".

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_2
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: The second stage of culture shock, "the hostility stage", eventually occurs.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_3
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: At this point, some defense mechanisms are devised to protect yourself against the effects of culture shock.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_4
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: The third stage of culture shock adjustment, "recovery", starts.
